company_description: Grover provides an online platform for renting tech products through monthly subscriptions. With Grover, subscribers get access to a wide range of over 3,000 tech products, including smartphones, laptops, virtual reality (VR) gear, wearables, and smart home appliances on a flexible monthly rental basis. Its service allows its users to keep, switch, buy, or return products depending on their individual needs and budget.
seed_investors: Seedcamp, Magnetic, GFC, Neosfer, Hannover Innovation, Enjoyventure
